subject: Using jmock for testing a void method
msgSnippet: Hello everybody, Iam having a void method.(say x()) In which it calls another void method.(say y()) I have to test whether y() is called in x() or not using
messageBody:
Hello everybody,

Iam having a void method.(say x())
In which it calls another void method.(say y())
I have to test whether y() is called in x() or not using jmock.
Can any one guide me to how to write the test case (programming)?

With regards
Vara Prasad
